sentence: This is Republican state Sen. Doug Mastriano,? said the spot that blazed across Pennsylvanias television airwaves, touting the candidates staunch opposition to abortion and mail-in balloting and his whole-hog embrace of the stolen 2020 election lie.
title: Column: A Pennsylvania Democrat pays to pick his GOP opponent? Californias got the playbook

sentence: In Pennsylvania, the GOP primary race for the U.S. Senate has drawn all the attention because a certain TV doctor endorsed by former President Trump is running but my eyes were drawn to the results of the Republican gubernatorial contest, won by the Trump-backed insurrectionist candidate Doug Mastriano, a retired Army colonel who was pictured outside the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6.
author: Paul ThorntonLetters Editor
title: Opinion: The European country suffering from Tucker Carlson Syndrome
